text: It's fun to play mom. Last I knew I was playing a 17-year-old who graduated.
author: Selma Blair

text: I always say I am a realist, and my mom says, 'No, you just have anxiety.'
author: Jessica Chastain

text: I wanted to perform well for my mom and dad, because in high school, I didn't have a job. My brothers, they worked at Pizza Hut or places like that, but sports, that was my way of giving back.
author: Junior Seau

text: All of us kids ended up 'doing Mom.' There are four of us who've tried show business. Five if you insist on counting my sister the nun, who does liturgical dance.
author: Bill Murray

text: I was class mom at the preschool one year and I was pretty much asked not to do that again!
author: Julie Bowen
